programme.title: Lakota Nation vs. United States
programme.desc: The Lakota people fight to reclaim their sacred land and protect it from government and corporate interests.

programme.title: Hold Your Fire
programme.desc: In 1973, the NYPD corners four young African Americans who planned to steal guns for the purpose of self-defense. Visionary police psychologist Harvey Schlossberg convinces his superiors to allow him to negotiate and save the 12 hostages.

programme.title: The Torch
programme.desc: Guitar icon Buddy Guy reflects on his legacy and passes along the blues lessons he received from legends Muddy Waters and Howlin' Wolf.

programme.title: Bad Axe
programme.desc: A real-time portrait of 2020 unfolds as an Asian American family in rural Michigan fights to keep its restaurant and American dream alive.

programme.title: The Opening Act
programme.desc: A stand-up comedian encounters relentless hecklers, drunken groupies and hard-to-impress DJs after landing a gig as an emcee for his idol.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, ex-cop Thomas Malone gets a chance to win his freedom if he can survive a twisted game. Six goons pay for the thrill of hunting Malone for sport on a remote island, but once he arrives, all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Last Looks
programme.desc: An ex-cop comes out of retirement to investigate the mysterious death of drunken actor Alistair Pinch's wife. The case finds him contending with gangsters and Hollywood executives, all in pursuit of clearing Pinch's name -- or confirming his guilt.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: Forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: An insight into the world of trauma cleaning through the journey of larger-than-life business owner Sandra Pankhurst and the workers at Melbourne's Specialized Cleaning Services.

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: A Los Angeles police officer and his K-9 partner try to uncover a vast conspiracy that has a chokehold on the city.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man he's never met.

programme.title: Murder at Yellowstone City
programme.desc: Yellowstone City falls on hard times when a prospector is found dead and the sheriff quickly arrests a mysterious newcomer. However, as the brutal murders continue, worried residents prepare for a final showdown that pits neighbor against neighbor.

programme.title: Comic Book Men
programme.desc: A fan of "The Dukes of Hazzard" stops by to show off his collection of memorabilia; Walt encounters his first "brony.".

programme.title: Comic Book Men
programme.desc: The guys travel to the Baltimore Comic Con to launch their comic book, "Cryptozoic Man"; Jeff works on a Saturday to fill in for Walt.

programme.title: Comic Book Men
programme.desc: A customer buys a gift for his father's 75th birthday; the Stash throws a party for Superman's 75th birthday.

programme.title: Mayfair Witches
programme.desc: Rowan makes a shocking discovery but has to deal with it alone; a tragic event brings Rowan closer to the Mayfairs -- and Lasher; Sip falls deeper down the rabbit hole of the key necklace.

programme.title: Mayfair Witches
programme.desc: Rowan inadvertently discovers her role in a prophecy that's held the Mayfair family for generations; Sip's investigation reaches its conclusion, uncovering secrets that could tarnish both Rowan's family and his role in the Talamasca.

programme.title: Mayfair Witches
programme.desc: Neurosurgeon Rowan Fielding has a problem -- when she gets mad, she kills with her mind; her search for answers sends her toward her secretive biological family; in New Orleans, Deirdre Mayfair is desperate to escape from her aunt's oppressive house.

programme.title: Mayfair Witches
programme.desc: Wracked with grief over Ellie's death, Rowan is out of control and unfit to perform surgeries; her paranoia that someone is following her is proven true; in New Orleans, Deirdre and her mysterious companion Lasher work together to draw Rowan home.

programme.title: Mayfair Witches

Formuła 1: Grand Prix Wielkiej Brytanii
programme.desc: Dwunasta runda tegorocznego cyklu będzie miała szczególne znaczenia dla Lewisa Hamiltona. Po przenosinach do Ferrari wyniki Brytyjczyka pozostawiają wiele do życzenia, lecz zmagania na legendarnym torze Silverstone mogą się okazać dla niego momentem zwrotnym sezonu. Siedmiokrotny mistrz świata wygrał tu rekordowe dziewięć wyścigów, ostatni z nich w 2024 roku. Było to wówczas jego pierwsze zwycięstwo od ponad 900 dni! Od ponownego przebudzenia Hamiltona bardziej prawdopodobny wydaje się jednak triumf innego z Brytyjczyków - George'a Russella, jego byłego partnera z Mercedesa, lub Landa Norrisa z bardzo szybkiego w obecnej kampanii McLarena. Na Silverstone błysnąć postara się też Oscar Piastri, który mimo delikatnego potknięcia w Grand Prix Kanady pozostał liderem klasyfikacji generalnej kierowców.
